author: Nicole Acevedo
title: As more Latinos test positive to coronavirus, Illinois officials worry deaths will spike
description: Illinois Latinos are testing positive to coronavirus at higher rates than any other demographic group. If the number of cases keeps rising so will the death rates, experts say.
content:
Latinos are testing positive to coronavirus at higher rates than any other demographic group in Illinois, alarming officials and experts who say that if the number of COVID-19 cases "continues to rise in Latino communities, so too will the rates of deaths."
